description: High-quality photocopy paper 70gsm weight for crisp and clear prints A4 size for versatile use 500 sheets per bundle for convenience and cost-effectiveness Compatible with most photocopy machines and printers Introducing our proMate Photocopy Paper 70gsm A4 Bundle, featuring 500 high-quality sheets. This versatile, lightweight paper is ideal for all your copying needs. With a crisp white finish, it ensures clear and sharp prints, making it perfect for documents, reports, and presentations. Each sheet is 70gsm, offering a perfect balance between durability and flexibility. Whether you're a student, professional, or a busy office, this bundle will keep you well-stocked and ready to tackle your printing tasks with ease.
